tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE knowledge_base (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE article_comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  article_id INT,
  commenter_name VARCHAR(100),
  comment_text TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE KnowledgeBaseEntries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    content TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Categories (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    email TEXT UNIQUE,
    role TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Keywords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    keyword TEXT UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE UserRoles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    role TEXT UNIQUE
)
